label: 天照
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
説明文: The sun goddess Amaterasu resided in the palace where the mirror, one of the regalia, resided. According to the Nihon shoki, she presented a curved jewel (yasakani no magatama), a mirror (yata no kagami), and a sword (kusanagi no tsurugi) to Ninigi.
